nodes.text: This inn was located in the capital city of Tammuz-an.

A multi-story building, the inn had a window at the top floor where residents could look out over the city. It was used as a temporary hiding place for Mon Julpa and his companions Sollag Den, Jann Tosh and the droids C-3PO and R2-D2 as they awaited the coming of the first sunrise of the equinox, when Julpa could perform the necessary ritual to become King of Tammuz-an.

Vinga, one of the Vizier Ko Zatec-Cha's henchmen spied on them from a ladder and was chased upon discovery. While Julpa was left alone in the room, he was captured by the droid bounty hunter IG-88, who also took his Royal Scepter.
